sentences.sContent: Teachers were impressed by his vocabulary.
sentences.sCn: 他的词汇量给老师们留下了深刻的印象。

sentences.sContent: ...Some students mark new vocabulary in a different color...
...teachers seem to be more concerned with grammar and vocabulary but not spelling...

remMethod.val: voc(声音) ＋ abul(看作able， 能够) ＋ ary → 能够发出声音朗读的 → 词汇

trans.tranCn: 词汇表， 词汇， 语汇
trans.tranOther: all the words that someone knows or uses
